      static void requestEmailVerfiyInBackground(java.lang.String email, RequestEmailVerifyCallback callback)
      调用这个方法会给用户的邮箱发送一封验证邮件，让用户能够确认在AVOS Cloud网站上注册的账号邮箱 除非这个方法在一个后台线程中被调用，请勿使用 requestEmailVerify()
      static void requestEmailVerify(java.lang.String email)
      调用这个方法会给用户的邮箱发送一封验证邮件，让用户能够确认在AVOS Cloud网站上注册的账号邮箱 除非是在一个后台线程中调用这个方法， 否则，一般情况下，请使用AVUser.requestEmailVerfiyInBackground(email,callback)方法进行调用

      调用这个方法来请求用户的手机号码验证 在发送这条请求前，请保证您已经成功保存用户的手机号码，并且在控制中心打开了“验证注册用户手机号码”选项 本方法请在异步方法中调用

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AVUser

        public AVUser()
        Constructs a new AVUser with no data in it. A AVUser constructed in this way will not have an objectId and will not persist to the database until AVUser.signUp() is called.

      • AVUser

        public AVUser(Parcel in)

      • enableAutomaticUser

        public static void enableAutomaticUser()
        Enables automatic creation of anonymous users. After calling this method, AVUser.getCurrentUser() will always have a value. The user will only be created on the server once the user has been saved, or once an object with a relation to that user or an ACL that refers to the user has been saved. Note: saveEventually will not work if an item being saved has a relation to an automatic user that has never been saved.

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()
        Whether the AVUser has been authenticated on this device. This will be true if the AVUser was obtained via a logIn or signUp method. Only an authenticated AVUser can be saved (with altered attributes) and deleted.

      • isAnonymous

      • logIn

        public static <T extends AVUser> T logIn(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                              throws AVException

        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using AVUser.getCurrentUser()

        Typically, you should use AVUser.logInInBackground(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, com.parse.LogInCallback,Class clazz) instead of this, unless you are managing your own threading.

        参数:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        clazz - The AVUser itself or subclass.
        返回:
        The user if the login was successful.
        抛出:
        AVException

      • logInInBackground

        public static void logInInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     LogInCallback<AVUser> callback)
        参数:
        username -
        password -
        callback -
        另请参阅:
        logInInBackground(String, String, LogInCallback, Class)

      • logInInBackground

        public static <T extends AVUser> void logInInBackground(java.lang.String username,
                                        java.lang.String password,
                                        LogInCallback<T> callback,
                                        java.lang.Class<T> clazz)

        Logs in a user with a username and password. On success, this saves the session to disk, so you can retrieve the currently logged in user using AVUser.getCurrentUser()

        This is preferable to using AVUser.logIn(java.lang.String, java.lang.String), unless your code is already running from a background thread.

        参数:
        username - The username to log in with.
        password - The password to log in with.
        clazz - The AVUser itself or subclass.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the login completes.

      • signUpOrLoginByMobilePhone

        public static AVUser signUpOrLoginByMobilePhone(java.lang.String mobilePhoneNumber,
                                java.lang.String smsCode)
                                         throws AVException
        直接通过手机号码和验证码来创建或者登录用户。 如果手机号码已经存在则为登录，否则创建新用户 请不要在UI线程中间调用此方法
        参数:
        mobilePhoneNumber -
        smsCode -
        返回:
        抛出:
        AVException
        从以下版本开始:
        2.6.10
        另请参阅:
        AVOSCloud.requestSMSCode(String)

        从以下版本开始:
        2.6.10
        另请参阅:
        AVOSCloud.requestSMSCodeInBackgroud(String, RequestMobileCodeCallback)

      • logOut

        public static void logOut()
        Logs out the currently logged in user session. This will remove the session from disk, log out of linked services, and future calls to AVUser.getCurrentUser() will return null.

      • put

        public void put(java.lang.String key,
       java.lang.Object value)
        Add a key-value pair to this object. It is recommended to name keys in partialCamelCaseLikeThis.
        覆盖:
        put 在类中 AVObject
        参数:
        key - Keys must be alphanumerical plus underscore, and start with a letter.
        value - Values may be numerical, String, JSONObject, JSONArray, JSONObject.NULL, or other AVObjects.

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String key)
        Removes a key from this object's data if it exists.
        覆盖:
        remove 在类中 AVObject
        参数:
        key - The key to remove.

      • requestPasswordReset

        public static void requestPasswordReset(java.lang.String email)

        Requests a password reset email to be sent to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely reset their password on the AVOSCloud site.

        Typically, you should use AVUser.requestPasswordResetInBackground(java.lang.String, com.parse.RequestPasswordResetCallback) instead of this, unless you are managing your own threading.

        参数:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.

      • requestPasswordResetInBackground

        public static void requestPasswordResetInBackground(java.lang.String email,
                                    RequestPasswordResetCallback callback)

        Requests a password reset email to be sent in a background thread to the specified email address associated with the user account. This email allows the user to securely reset their password on the AVOSCloud site.

        This is preferable to using requestPasswordReset(), unless your code is already running from a background thread.

        参数:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • requestEmailVerify

        public static void requestEmailVerify(java.lang.String email)

        调用这个方法会给用户的邮箱发送一封验证邮件，让用户能够确认在AVOS Cloud网站上注册的账号邮箱

        除非是在一个后台线程中调用这个方法， 否则，一般情况下，请使用AVUser.requestEmailVerfiyInBackground(email,callback)方法进行调用

        参数:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.

      • requestEmailVerfiyInBackground

        public static void requestEmailVerfiyInBackground(java.lang.String email,
                                  RequestEmailVerifyCallback callback)

        调用这个方法会给用户的邮箱发送一封验证邮件，让用户能够确认在AVOS Cloud网站上注册的账号邮箱

        除非这个方法在一个后台线程中被调用，请勿使用 requestEmailVerify()

        参数:
        email - The email address associated with the user that forgot their password.
        callback - callback.done(e) is called when the request completes.

      • signUp

        public void signUp()
            throws AVException

        Signs up a new user. You should call this instead of AVObject.save() for new AVUsers. This will create a new AVUser on the server, and also persist the session on disk so that you can access the user using AVUser.getCurrentUser().

        A username and password must be set before calling signUp.

        Typically, you should use AVUser.signUpInBackground(com.parse.SignUpCallback) instead of this, unless you are managing your own threading.

        抛出:
        AVException

      • signUpInBackground

        public void signUpInBackground(SignUpCallback callback)

        Signs up a new user. You should call this instead of AVObject.save() for new AVUsers. This will create a new AVUser on the server, and also persist the session on disk so that you can access the user using AVUser.getCurrentUser().

        A username and password must be set before calling signUp.

        This is preferable to using AVUser.signUp(), unless your code is already running from a background thread.

        参数:
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the signUp completes.

      • followInBackground

        public void followInBackground(java.lang.String userObjectId,
                      FollowCallback callback)

        Follow the user specified by userObjectId. This will create a follow relation between this user and the user specified by the userObjectId.

        参数:
        userObjectId - The user objectId.
        callback - callback.done(user, e) is called when the follow completes.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.1.3

      • followerQuery

        public static <T extends AVUser> AVQuery<T> followerQuery(java.lang.String userObjectId,
                                          java.lang.Class<T> clazz)

        创建follower查询。请确保传入的userObjectId不为空，否则会抛出IllegalArgumentException。 创建follower查询后，您可以使用whereEqualTo("follower", userFollower)查询特定的follower。 您也可以使用skip和limit支持分页操作。

        参数:
        userObjectId - 待查询的用户objectId。
        clazz - AVUser类或者其子类。
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.0

      • followerQuery

        public <T extends AVUser> AVQuery<T> followerQuery(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                        throws AVException

        创建follower查询。创建follower查询后，您可以使用whereEqualTo("follower", userFollower)查询特定的follower。 您也可以使用skip和limit支持分页操作。

        参数:
        clazz - AVUser类或者其子类。
        抛出:
        AVException
        从以下版本开始:
        2.3.0

                     LogInCallback<AVUser> callback)

      • loginWithAuthData

        public static <T extends AVUser> void loginWithAuthData(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                        AVUser.AVThirdPartyUserAuth userInfo,
                                        LogInCallback<T> callback)
        生成一个新的AVUser子类化对象，并且将该对象与SNS平台获取的userInfo关联。
        参数:
        clazz - 子类化的AVUer的class对象
        userInfo - 在SNS登录成功后，返回的userInfo信息。
        callback - 关联完成后，调用的回调函数。
        从以下版本开始:
        1.4.4
